Key Match Events: Giannis Antetokounmpo scored the first four points of the game and made a massive chase-down block on LeBron James at the start of the second quarter.
Bobby Portis made his first five 3-point attempts and tallied 23 points and three rebounds in 14 minutes in the first half.
AJ Johnson used his speed to create an advantage and made a significant impact after entering the game earlier than expected.
Post-Match Reflections: Doc Rivers expressed satisfaction with the effort level throughout the game despite it being a preseason match.
Bobby Portis credited his strong preseason performance to his hard work over the summer.
Portis emphasized the importance of finding the right speed to play effectively in the NBA.
